ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bards Role (was CHains)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Would Legba O Cobalt be sacrilegious?  ;^) I d go Legba O Greene.  Green being the color of most life on Norath (trees, shrubs, & blades of grass outnumber
ygData.messageBody:
> BTW, since bards are probably pretty creative, I need to pick my last
> name. I am a dwarven cleric named Legba. Our group is the Wandering
> Hues, and we all take the last name of O'<color>. Example the warrior
> is Willae O'Grae. I was thinking taking blue (for healing). What do
> you all think? (O'Blue O'Blew O'Blough O'Bluwe etc...) Think blue is
> the right color for cleric?

Would Legba O'Cobalt be sacrilegious? ;^)

I'd go Legba O'Greene. Green being the color of most life on Norath (trees,
shrubs, & blades of grass outnumber mobs)

Peace
Evulia, bard of 10 verses
